touristData.hotelGuestHouseName: Lamsa Hotel Upper Kachura Lake, Skardu

facilities.otherFacilities: Terrace overlooking lake, free parking, garden seating

additionalNotes.challengesFaced: Access road gets narrow near lake in peak season.
additionalNotes.specialServices: Boat rides on the lake can be arranged; terrace dining with lake view.
additionalNotes.touristOriginFeedback: Great location for lake-view and peaceful stay away from city noise.

facilities.otherFacilities: Central location with rooftop view, nearby parking, family dining area

additionalNotes.challengesFaced: Situated in busy area; occasional night-time market noise and limited parking.
additionalNotes.specialServices: Restaurant open late; takeaway meals for travelers; traditional Balti dishes available.
additionalNotes.touristOriginFeedback: Popular for affordability, location, and helpful staff; suitable for short stays.
additionalNotes.otherTouristPlacesMentioned: Evening walk to the bazaar and nearby Skardu Fort trail

facilities.otherFacilities: Central location near Ragayul market, rooftop dining area, street-side parking

additionalNotes.challengesFaced: Located in busy city market area; occasional evening noise and parking congestion.
additionalNotes.specialServices: In-house restaurant serving Balti food; quick access to markets, pharmacies, and local taxis.
additionalNotes.touristOriginFeedback: Convenient for budget travellers, good food, clean rooms, friendly staff.
additionalNotes.otherTouristPlacesMentioned: Ragayul market street, Skardu Fort hill viewpoint

touristData.fullAddress: Near Shangrila Lake, Lower Kachura, Skardu

constructionMaterials.other: Stone & wood blend with glass panels

facilities.otherFacilities: Lake view terrace, garden seating, campfire area, parking available

additionalNotes.challengesFaced: Access road narrow during peak season; limited parking space during holidays.
additionalNotes.specialServices: Boat rides and guided tours available; traditional Balti tea served on arrival.
additionalNotes.touristOriginFeedback: Preferred for peaceful lake-side stay, beautiful sunrise view and clean rooms.
additionalNotes.otherTouristPlacesMentioned: Nearby Shangrila Resort, Upper Kachura Lake, Soq Valley

constructionMaterials.other: Stone & tile finish with wooden balconies

facilities.otherFacilities: Balcony rooms with mountain-view, Free parking, Rooftop dining area, 24-hour reception

additionalNotes.challengesFaced: Some rooms may have limited mountain view; access road slope can be steep during rain or snow.
additionalNotes.specialServices: Free private parking included; balcony rooms available; guided tours to Satpara and Kachura available on request.
additionalNotes.touristOriginFeedback: Highly rated for scenic balcony views, cleanliness, and proximity to the airport. Guests appreciate traditional meals and friendly staff.
